task.title: Preview code with a live text editor
task.shortdesc: To streamline the process of checking the output of smaller segments of code, an online text editor for HTML and CSS that automatically generates the visual output.

prereq.p: A stable internet connection is needed to use a live text editor.
The user should also have some CSS code for blockquote ready to copy and paste, which can bemade by themselves, copied from another source, or a combination of both.

steps.step: In your web browser, go to the address codepen.io. There are other online text editors that may work similarly. For this task, CodePen is used for simplicity.
Either log in with an existing account, or create an account and fill out the necessary fields.
Create a new Pen, which will direct you to the the live editor.
In the HTML field, create an instance of blockquote. This can be done either by copying from an HTML document or simply typing placeholder text surrounded by the blockquote tags
In the CSS field, paste in the code you wish you to preview.
Inspect the preview window to check output of code.
Make edits to code with the CSS field if neessary.
